data.name: labelDisplayNameFormat.Help
data.value: Format of the display name generated for user. Template variables for name parts are [FIRSTNAME], [LASTNAME], [OTHERNAME] and also [F], [L], [O] for first letters only.

data.name: labelUserNameFormat.Help
data.value: Format of the username generated for user. This setting will be ignored if using emails as usernames is enabled in the site settings. Template variables for name parts are [FIRSTNAME], [LASTNAME], [OTHERNAME], [EMAIL] and also [F], [L], [O] for first letters only. Name parts will be transliterated and lowercased, all non-alphanumeric characters will be replaced with underscore.

data.name: labelRoles.Help
data.value: Comma-separated list of role names to assign to newly created users. If some of the specified roles doesn't exists, they will be ignored.

data.name: labelDoneUrl.Help
data.value: The custom URL to redirect after user was created. [USERID], [TABID] and [PORTALID] template variables supported. If "Open inside Popup" checked, the URL will be opened inside DNN popup (providing that popups are enabled in site settings).
